relation: Great for these types of students
all different cultures are put into one at this school
I like to do at home activities with my daughters such as coloring, taking a stroll, playing learning games with them, and enjoy watching them grow.
I have never ate at the cafeteria, but i heard it is some very good food and nice staff
Very great academic programs and very welcoming
Stay in school and keep up with good attendance. Follow up with classes if you miss. Do homework and hand in on-time.

United Tribes is a great college to attend, you can get along well with faculty and all classmates. In individual vocations you feel as if that is your family. Its a fun, loving, patient, considerable college

textAfterTable: Did learn a lot I had an amazing opportunity to learn at UTTC. My instructors were well versed in the topics they were teaching, and were able to give me real world examples along with theory from my texts to support the lesson! Login to rate or flag the reviews Jordon from Bismarck, ND 03/08/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 18 Categories Comments Food and Dining the food is ok. Dorm Life i do not live in the dorm, but i hear good things about it. Academic Rigor the education is good here, however, i would rate the administration (financial aid etc.) poorly. they are not helpful or friendly and i found i had to do a lot of paperwork by myself.
